title: TED++: Submanifold-Aware Backdoor Detection via Layerwise Tubular-Neighbourhood Screening
summary: As deep neural networks power increasingly critical applications, stealthy backdoor attacks, where poisoned training inputs trigger malicious model behaviour while appearing benign, pose a severe security risk. Many existing defences are vulnerable when attackers exploit subtle distance-based anomalies or when clean examples are scarce.
